subject: Basketball
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: Former N.B.A. player Jayson Williams admitted Friday that he was driving drunk when he slammed his sport utility vehicle into a tree, capping years of legal and personal problems with a guilty plea that will give him additional time in prison.
snippet: Former N.B.A. player Jayson Williams admitted Friday that he was driving drunk when he slammed his sport utility vehicle into a tree, capping years of legal and personal problems with a guilty plea that will give him additional time in prison.
